description: Provides rich language support for XML
xml.format.wrapLineLength.desc: Maximum amount of characters per line (0 = disable).
xml.format.preserveNewLines.desc: Whether existing line breaks before elements should be preserved.
xml.format.maxPreserveNewLines.desc: Maximum number of line breaks to be preserved in one chunk. Use `null` for unlimited.
xml.format.wrapAttributes.auto: Wrap attributes only when line length is exceeded.
xml.format.wrapAttributes.forcealign: Wrap each attribute except first and keep aligned.
xml.format.wrapAttributes.alignedmultipl: Wrap when line length is exceeded, align attributes vertically.
xml.format.wrapAttributes.preservealigne: Preserve wrapping of attributes but align.
xml.format.wrapAttributesIndentSize.desc: Alignment size when using 'force aligned' and 'aligned multiple' in `#xml.format.wrapAttributes#` or `null` to use the default indent size.
xml.format.unformattedContentDelimiter.d: Keep text content together between this string.
xml.suggest.enabled.desc: Enable/disable autocompletion proposals for XML elements and attributes.
xml.trace.server.desc: Traces the communication between VS Code and the XML language server.
